50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'Whoever asks Allah for Paradise three times, Paradise will say: 'O Allah, admit him to Paradise.' And whoever seeks protection from Hell three times, Hell will say: 'O Allah, protect him from the Fire

chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from the Heat of the Fire
